title: There's Always Juliet
description: ""There's Always Juliet"" is a romantic comedy play written by John Van Druten. The story revolves around a young woman named Juliet who meets a man named Tom in a park. They both feel an instant connection and decide to spend the day together. As they get to know each other, they realize that they are perfect for each other. However, Juliet is engaged to another man and Tom is married. Despite their circumstances, they continue to see each other and fall deeply in love. The play explores their relationship and the challenges they face as they try to navigate their feelings and their commitments to others. Will they choose to be together or will they honor their existing commitments?
